name: nuxt-cordova-app
description: Nuxt JS + Vuetify 2 hybrid SPA app with Cordova
author: Ryan Holton

scripts.cordova-ios: npm run build-spa && npm run replace-relative-paths && npm run copy-cordova && npm run run-ios;
scripts.cordova-android: npm run build-spa && npm run replace-relative-paths && npm run copy-cordova && npm run run-android;
scripts.replace-relative-paths: replace '/nuxtfiles/' 'nuxtfiles/' dist --recursive && replace '/assets/' 'nuxtfiles/' dist --recursive && replace '(href|src|"href"|"src")="/' '$1="../' dist --recursive && replace '(href|src|"href"|"src"):"/' '$1:"../' dist --recursive
